title: PRO drop new carbon and alloy eMTB bars, entry-level droppers and saddles
content:
PRO Bike Gear have today added a host of entry-level mountain bike componentry, meant to be budget-friendly. We have the PRO Koryak carbon and alloy eMTB handlebars, internal and external PRO LT Level Dropper seatposts, and a new PRO Stealth Off-road Sport Saddle for gravel and MTB, with an ergonomic cut-out design for pressure relief

The post PRO drop new carbon and alloy eMTB bars, entry-level droppers and saddles appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
